---
title: "Test strip.white"
---

## strip.white is TRUE by default

```{r}

1 + 1 

```

## It can be opt out

```{r}
#| strip.white: false

1 + 1

```

## When collapse is TRUE, default is FALSE

```{r}
#| collapse: true

1 + 1

2 + 2

```

## It can also be changed

```{r}
#| collapse: true
#| strip.white: true

1 + 1

2 + 2

```
